reviews.title: Must be better options in Munich
reviews.text: I didn't rate this hotel when staying there recently. The hotel staff were lovely but it stopped there. The room was very small; the bed a single; I had to collect the iron from reception and they provided no ironing board; the shower fluctuated between hot and cold and the noise from outside was very disturbing.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: One of the most comfortable hotel beds I have experienced. Near Sendlinger Tor UBahn. Not too far from Alt Rathaus. Expensive at time of Octoberfest. Fair breakfast. Friendly service. Had room on street and was worried about noise but windows were sound proof.
reviews.title: Great beds

reviews.text: The location near Sendlinger Tor is excellent, both for walking into the old city centre (10 mins) and for public transport links (trams and U-bahn). The staff were unfailingly pleasant and helpful both on reception and at breakfast. Breakfast provided a good variety of interesting food. The modern open-plan reception and breakfast area were very welcoming. Free coffee and apples were provided in reception but the coffee wasn't hot by late afternoon! Our room was small but clean but wasn't provided with coffee and tea-making facilities which would have been good. We found a good choice of excellent restaurants within a few minutes walk of the hotel, and the area felt completely safe late in the evening.
reviews.title: Really convenient location for city centre

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All in all a very good choice for anyone visiting Munich for the first time.
reviews.title: I was very satisfied.

reviews.text: I've stayed at the Carat in Aug 2011 and again in July 2012, both times in the apartment side. I love the location. It's a short walk to the Sendlinger Tor tram/U-bahn station whence it is a single stop to Karlsplatz on the tram, Hauptbanhof on the #1 or #2 U-bahn and Marienplatz on the #3 or #6 U-bahn. You can also catch a bus directly to the viktualienmarkt. The walk from Sendlinger Tor to Marienplatz is short and pleasant. It's in a residential neigbourhood but there is a good pizza restaurant next door and a number of restaurants one street east.
reviews.title: Hotel near gay area
Not very happy...
reviews.text: Nothing to say about location and kindness of Reception people but, also this year, during the night some people were doing a lot of noise with loud music and voices, the wireless connection, eve if free was working very bad. Nice but small room and good breakfast.

reviews.title: Good location and well kept
reviews.text: This hotel is easily accessible from the Sendlinger Tor underground station and close to Sendlinger Strasse, where you find many small shops on your way to Marienplatz (New City Hall, pedestrian walk, shops, etc). It is basically in the city center.

reviews.title: Not a lot of privacy
reviews.text: The hotel is basic, but well kept, clean and with a service minded and efficient staff. The room I got was small but very quiet. It faced the back of the building which might be preferable as the front of the hotel faces the busy Lindwurmstrasse. Bathroom seemed newly decorated and was kept very clean. There was no room service or iron/ironboard, but a small minibar. The room had a minimal TV of the old bulky style with only a few German channels. Free internet was a great plus though, and it worked well.

reviews.title: Apartments - a pleasing proposition.
reviews.text: Breakfast buffet was good and above average quality for a three star hotel if you skipped the hot items which were a bit of a let down. Good selection of juices and strong coffee. Apart from the breakfast service, there is no restaurant in the Hotel. I would recommend the Mixto restaurant just next door if you just want som lighter dishes like pasta, pizza or a sandwhich. Reasonable prices, good quality and speedy service.

reviews.title: Parking is a bear
reviews.text: Overall, I was very pleased with my stay and would consider stay at Carat Hotel again. Since this was a business trip paid by my German hosts, I cannot comment on the price, but a quick check on the net would lead me to believe that you get good value.

reviews.title: Excellent location and very good staff
reviews.text: I stayed in the Carat Hotel in for three nights in May 2013. The front desk staff were very helpful. The room was clean and nicely furnished. The U-bahn station is just a short walk away. Many other destinations (bahnhof or downtown) can also be walked in 10 minutes or so.

reviews.title: Good location, Small rooms
reviews.text: I would gladly stay here again. The hotel is not fancy or up-scale, but it does have very good staff, a decent location, clean and has a reasonable price.

reviews.title: Bring ear plugs
reviews.text: The only negative was shortly after I checked in. A couple in an adjoining room were having a “discussion” in which I could here every word. Rather than complain, I turned up the TV until they got the hint & cooled it. I was fortunate everything was quiet for the remaining stay.

reviews.title: Awesome home base for a trip to Munich/Bavaria
reviews.text: We booked the Carat through Expedia and accidentally entered 1 for number of people in the room and booked it. We tried to change it afterwards and contacted the hotel via email and they were unable to help us change it. When we got to Munich we tried again to change rooms and the staff was not very helpful. The room was very small especially for two people. The bathroom was also quite small and it gets pretty noisy at night. We did get a good price on the room which helped the situation and the location is good, but if we return to Munich we will be staying elsewhere.

reviews.title: location, location, location
reviews.text: This is a perfectly fine hotel within easy walking distance of the beautiful old Munich city centre, and easy to get to by S-bahn and U-bahn from the airport.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The lobby and dining area was nicely decorated and felt secure.
reviews.title: Awesome location but basic rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was cramped and slightly run down and tired but was neat and clean. We had our own bathroom and fridge. The room faced out onto the road but was double paned and had little road noise. For some reason we were given a room with two single beds.
reviews.title: Basic rooms but well located

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is in a great location and is easy walking distance to e Platz and some great eateries.
reviews.title: Very small rooms but convenient location

reviews.text: Wifi was available but the signal was low and we had to ask for access - one password per device.
reviews.title: Good hotel for a short business stay

reviews.text: Breakfast was well stocked and was tasty!
